params.mode: The compatibility mode to check against.

returns.compatible: Whether the schemas are compatible under the given mode.

returns._0: The latest version number (0 if none registered).

params.subject: The subject identifier (e.g. topic or entity type).

returns.schemaId: The unique identifier of the registered schema.

returns.data: The schema data from the target version (actual transformation is off-chain).

getSchema(string,uint256).notice: Retrieves a schema by subject name and version number.

latestVersion(string).notice: Returns the latest version number for a subject.

register(string,bytes,string).notice: Registers a new schema version for a subject.

upcast(string,uint256,uint256).notice: Requests an upcast transformation between schema versions.
